revised_title: Numerical Simulation of Contaminant Dispersion in Estuary Flows: A Random Walk Technique
tldr: This article presents a study on the dispersion of a passive contaminant in estuary flows using a random walk technique. The authors develop a new method to analyze and predict concentration distributions, which is more realistic than the standard diffusion equation. The simulation results show that this method is useful and versatile for studying dispersion in oscillatory flows, providing valuable insights for understanding and predicting contaminant behavior in estuaries.
